author: Phil Vickery
method: With a sharp knife cut a circle of fruit loaf, the same size as a 5cm/2in chefs' ring, and push into the base of a chefs' ring on a small serving plate.  Mix together the mascarpone, whipped cream, vanilla seeds, stem ginger, stem ginger syrup and honey in a mizing bowl. Spoon the mixture on top of the malt loaf in the chefs' ring.  Smooth the top with a palate knife.  Blast the edges of the chefs' ring with a blow torch and remove the chefs' ring.  Decorate the top of the cheesecake with orange slices and then sprinkle with cinnamon, toasted flaked almonds and a mint sprig.
ingredients: 1 slice fruit loaf,  125g/4½oz mascarpone,  100ml/3½ fl oz double cream, whipped,  ½ vanilla pod, seeds scraped,  2 pieces of stem ginger, chopped,  dash stem ginger syrup,  1 tbsp honey,  1 orange, peeled, thinly sliced,  pinch cinnamon ,  2 tsp toasted flaked almonds ,  mint sprig
